title: Rito Should Make More Pool Party Skins
body:
Well, how many times has a pool party skin been requested? How come there is isn't a pool party Miss Fortune, Ahri, or Katarina? They are featured in other Pool Party Skins in the background (Atleast Ahri and Katarina).

In the photo, Kat is in front and Ahri is in the background waving. People have came up with evidence that Miss Fortune is there too. Not to mention how Garen and Katarina and in the Foreground like they were talking. (OH SNAP!)

As always, don't forget to Get Dunked! {{champion:254}}

EDIT: I'm thinking of drawing out some pool party skins with a friend and I might post them here. I need Riot KateyKhaos' Approval for that though. Thanks for answering this topic guys.

EDIT: Possible Topics Include these Champions:
{{champion:103}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:63}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:76}} 

EDIT: I'll start posting some possible champion splash arts from other League of Legends Summoners.
[Miss Fortune](http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/c9c0c20d5354d9518e1d5f1f69907c7a.jpg)
[Vayne](http://i.imgur.com/kmePBMe.jpg)
[Vi](http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/005/0/2/pool_party_vi_by_san_ru-d70y3dp.jpg)
[Sivir](http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/60ec1e5b047867926ad196810dbe11f0.jpg)
[Caitlyn](http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/299/e/d/pool_party_caitlyn_by_yumelujury-d8472yo.jpg)(This is a Cosplay but a good idea.)
[Jinx](http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/i/2014/142/7/b/pool_party_crasher_jinx_by_32channel-d7jadv9.jpg) (But no rocket...)
[Katarina](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=903092&d=1393100436)

EDIT: Pool Party Yasuo is being made. Add me here at Google Plus or visit my page for updates!
 thecrimsonelitest@gmail.com or https://plus.google.com/u/1/105406334356641398272/posts/p/pub

replies.body:
I think more Pool Party skins would be awesome! 

What champions would you like to see?! What would they be wearing (or wielding?!)

I believe the most voted was Aqua{{champion:154}}  mostly due to him being short on skins and him being in the background
but i think my list would go ....

- {{champion:117}} : No hat, onepiece swimsuit, surfboard for dash, sunscreen on her nose, Bubble Pix
- {{champion:44}} : Inflatable hammer and shield, inappropriately tight speedo for lulz

beach balls falling on everyone

Aww Rito pls there's already tons of Pool Party ideas in the background art for all 5 of the splashes.
Here's a list of all I could find.
{{champion:61}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:131}} 

And then there's a few who are just silhouettes, but they're in the background of Renekton's art
{{champion:121}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:30}} 

I'm just saying there's already tons of options that I'm sure we'd all love to see, so long as the next set of Pool Party skins is like last time, one for every role.
Personally I wanna see
Pool Party Yorick (top) Sun hat darkening his face, pool net for cleaning leaves and debris, plastic floaties for ghouls or something
Pool Party Xin Zhao (Jungle) Pool Noodle polearm
Pool Party Lux (Mid) Q could be a flung sand trap, E could be a water ball explosion, R could be big hydro cannon that sprinkles water for rainbow effect
Pool Party Ezreal (ADC) Shirtless and Shorts, his magic shooty thing could be a handfull of sand, his ult could be a blast of water
Pool Party Taric (Support) Is Fabulous with Ezreal, Water wing armor, big plastic toy hammer, boogie board sheild

Just my 2 cents

Vayne is in the back of Graves' splash. You missed her.

http://i.gyazo.com/b3115b089480175242057b7736f26f40.png

Third one to the right in the pool. No one else wears those goggles, yo.

I'm pretty sure that's just Katarina Darius and Garen.
I mean, Darius has some pretty iconic hair, Garen is OBVIOUSLY the big guy there, and Kat's hair is a pinkish-red color in Ziggs' splash art.  The only reason Darius seems to have goggles there is because low-res brow shadow.
Also this image
http://i.imgur.com/yrE83Ek.jpg
Long before Jinx came out lol
{{champion:222}} {{champion:25}},  and {{champion:67}}  is sitting at the end of Jinx's beach chair (That giveaway braid)
{{champion:59}} should be the next 1350 Pool party skin, with his weapon being a foam noodle and his ult creating an inflatable kiddie pool with splashing water effects inside as he creates it

I would LOVE to see a Pool Party Soraka! she would wear a one piece. Her staff would be a floppy pool noodle. her Q would be water falling down then ending with a big SPLASH! W would be watery looking. E would be a big whirlpool. and her R would have those splash buckets that you see at water parks. SPLASH down on all teammates healing them! :D

Pool Party Shen. There isn't a better life guard than a good Shen. :) Mini versions of Renekton's Pool Party board to replace his blades.

EDIT: And I want to see him show off those ninja tank muscles :(
Agreed. This theme has nothing to do with ninjas for once and would be a refreshing change of pace.

Make my name more awesome please !

Really? Nobody has mentioned {{champion:51}} with a super soaker?

I mean holy crap that's so obvious why hasn't anyone said anything?

How does nobody mention {{champion:24}} when he's right there in Zigg's splash art? He could wield a pool cleaning net. I don't play Jax but it could totally work.

Also Pool Party {{champion:222}} because of that one Pool Party artwork that was done as a teaser for Jinx. (It was in her perspective and she was clinking cups with Lee and Ziggs) Pow pow would be a small water mini-gun, Fishbones would be a super soaker or a water balloon gun, SMDR! would be like Ziggs and have a similar water balloon explosion ult thingy.

{{champion:15}} Pool Party Sivir throwing a floatie and her ult would be a whistle. It would compliment Renekton I guess.

Pool Party {{champion:154}} is a given but only if it isn't simply a recolor. Needs water sfx and stuff.

Pool Party {{champion:29}} has a super soaker that gets bigger when he ults.

...


 ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) 

Pool Party {{champion:421}} where she's an orca/badass dolphin/shark.

Pool Party {{champion:150}} : he's a sea-monkey otter looking thing (kinda like chimchar but more gnarly) and he turns into some weird urf thing.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EMVAAjn4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-08T00:43:52.214+0000)
>
> I think more Pool Party skins would be awesome! 
> 
> What champions would you like to see?! What would they be wearing (or wielding?!)

I THOUGHT YOU WOULD NEVER ASK :'D

Personally, I would go about it as such:

(Pool) Party Crashers!

Top: Yorick would be interesting for this, and I will go with it fully. Yorick would be pale with a slight sunburn, and he would be wearing a red and white stripped one piece swim suit. His shovel would be those nets pool boys use to clean pools. His ghouls would be different types of pool toys (Q could be a seal, W could be a giraffe, E  could be a snake), and his Ultimate would be a water clone which is tainted water.
Jungle: Zac, where he is water is fairly obvious, but give him trunks or a speedo, with goggles, and maybe some fish in him. His Q would be normal with splash effects, his W he would rupture in a splash, maybe some fish would come out too, his E would be him doing a dive across, and his Ult would be him preparing for a cannonball! 
Mid: I would love Orianna for this. She would try to enjoy the party like everyone else, but not being an actual person would make everyone else uncomfortable. Her Pet would be a beach ball, and she would be in a two piece (being made of two parts herself), and all her particles/effects would be watery!
Adc: Jinx with a water gun Pow Pow colored/designed like a duck or hippo, and either a proper shark or maybe even a crocodile designed to look like Pool Party Renekton for Fishbones that shoots water balloons. Her Zap! Would be a sling shot that she launches other water balloons. Her Chompers would be little crocodiles or crabs with water balloons strapped to them. Her ultimate would be a dolphin float-y that bursts into a huge splash!  
Support: Morganna would probably be ideal, and she could have a towel wrapped around her lower body to be her skirt, and then she could have a bikini top on too. As a comedy piece, maybe her wings are inflatable? Her effects would be pretty consistently water particles, maybe her Black Shield being the only thing that isn't. Maybe a water balloon shield or just water as well.

I think this is a pretty good outline. Would love to hear what you think, but I understand if you're busy. Hope you enjoy them regardless!
I think there's already a bunch of threads about suggestions.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EMVAAjn4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-08T00:43:52.214+0000)
>
> I think more Pool Party skins would be awesome!

Guess I will try and give a few ideas a shot.

{{champion:103}} - Have her orb be a beach ball and her flame attacks be water. She's be like the ultimate pool party girl ready for fun. Being a seductress though, still gotta look great. She'd be wearing a provocative monokini I think.
{{champion:9}} - Foam noodle Fiddle? Why not? Change the crows to seagulls or something though.
{{champion:254}} - Giant foam/balloon hands for the ultimate water battle. Her abilities would be perfect for a splash fight! 
{{champion:21}} - A two piece lifeguard outfit to make them ladies green with jealousy. Dual water pistols and an E that is a deluge of water to drench her opponents.
{{champion:222}} - Fighting back against Vi with her arsenal of Gatling water gun, rocket propelled coconuts, bouncing water balloon bombs that stun, and her R a water balloon in the shape of something funny.
{{champion:74}} - Science has gone mad at the pool! Turrets become water hoses like you see at water parks or something. Drawing a blank here but sure something fun could be thought up.
{{champion:201}} - Have his shield resemble a wooden Tiki statue face. Have him wear a stripped swimwear like mustached guys wore back in early 1900s like [this](https://images.search.yahoo.com/images/view;_ylt=A0LEViYYSNlUmkYAFrwnnIlQ;_ylu=X3oDMTB0dmRibmhwBHNlYwNzYwRjb2xvA2JmMQR2dGlkA1lIUzAwMV8x?p=early+1900+men+swimwear&back=https%3A%2F%2Fsearch.yahoo.com%2Fyhs%2Fsearch%3Fp%3Dearly%2B1900%2Bmen%2Bswimwear%26ei%3DUTF-8%26hsimp%3Dyhs-001%26hspart%3Dmozilla&w=200&h=316&imgurl=4.bp.blogspot.com%2F-JN1nKY4PTDI%2FUKO15AvMKzI%2FAAAAAAAAAAU%2FTYCIkytGrMM%2Fs1600%2F1900.jpg%231900%2520men%2527s%2520swim%2520wear%2520200x316&size=11KB&name=1900.jpg&rcurl=http%3A%2F%2Forangearticles.blogspot.com%2F2012%2F11%2Fevolution-of-mens-swimwear.html&rurl=http%3A%2F%2Forangearticles.blogspot.com%2F2012%2F11%2Fevolution-of-mens-swimwear.html&type=&no=1&tt=120&oid=609c7fb6268cfc4feecd092628aaf694&tit=1900.jpg%231900%2520men%2527s%2520swim%2520wear%2520200x316&sigr=12a1hqtil&sigi=13oik7ubt&sign=108djs908&sigt=103vg5ole&sigb=133t4pofm&fr=yhs-mozilla-001&hspart=mozilla&hsimp=yhs-001)
Pool Party Urgot would be awesome really. Eternal life and endless torture, but at the beach :D
Well I always thought Ahri (like everyone else) and make her with a beach ball for her orb! And of course her design in the splash above would be fine.
